title: Eternal
description: She was an orphan but has no memory of her childhood. She wanders the streets of London, willing her memory to return to her. Then strange things begin to happen. A tall stranger with a red scar follows and watches her. There is something odd and sinister about a certain bartender. The gallery owner where she works seems to have a secret. Strangest of all is the handsome man who approaches her and introduces himself. He tells her he is from her past and has always loved her. As memories of murder, love and mayhem slowly return to her, it becomes a race against time to trust him again and set both their spirits free.
author: D.L. Pearl
